data.lyric:
[ti:Woods]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Woods - Mac Miller
[00:13.38]Lyrics by：D. Ruoff/E. Dan/E. Klughammer/J. Brion/M. McCormick
[00:26.77]Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
[00:33.90]Yeah things like this ain't built to last
[00:37.32]I might just fade like those before me
[00:46.26]When will you forget my past
[00:48.73]Got questions ask you know the stories
[00:57.03]And you need to let me know
[00:59.34]When you're leaving where you go
[01:01.59]Can I come
[01:08.34]Do you believe me are you close
[01:10.48]Yeah even if you don't
[01:12.80]That'll get you sprung
[01:18.94]Do I do I do I love
[01:30.18]Can I can I can I get enough
[01:40.76]Yeah don't run away love
[01:43.03]Hate love heartbreak will have you bankrupt
[01:45.63]Too many days in a daze better wake up
[01:48.39]I put your face in a place where the space was
[01:51.27]Nobody makes you feel like you but
[01:52.77]Do I
[01:54.08]And you don't know what you should do
[01:55.58]You just lookin' for someone to make you move ooh tell me
[01:58.42]Do I
[02:05.00]I make this planet feel like home
[02:07.87]Miss us first time the door is closing
[02:16.23]So far beyond all our control
[02:19.05]You say it's all so close to broken
[02:27.21]It's so much better when you wait
[02:29.92]Forever and a day that's all I got
[02:38.43]Put it together then it breaks
[02:40.73]All the energy it takes it never stop
[02:49.23]Do I do I do I love
[03:00.56]Can I can I can I get enough
[03:11.15]Yeah I never slip I never fall
[03:13.98]I tried to tell you 'bout a better life
[03:15.61]And get involved big or small
[03:17.69]It's been my fault I keep it safe it's in the vault
[03:20.99]Blindfold her keep it going 'til we hit a wall yeah
[03:24.38]I'm never going through the motions
[03:25.98]I'm just tryna lay your body down slowly
[03:28.10]We can only go up
[03:30.91]We can only go up
[03:34.38]Do I do I do I love
[03:45.69]Can I can I can I get enough
data.trans:
[ti:Woods]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:13.38]//
[00:26.77]//
[00:33.90]这种事情注定不能长久
[00:37.32]我终究会像前人一样被遗忘
[00:46.26]你何时才会忘记我的过去
[00:48.73]有问题就问 你知道我的故事
[00:57.03]你得让我知道
[00:59.34]当你离开时 你会去哪里
[01:01.59]我能跟你走吗
[01:08.34]你相信我吗 你在附近吗
[01:10.48]即使你不信我
[01:12.80]你也会很惊讶
[01:18.94]我爱你吗
[01:30.18]我会知足吗
[01:40.76]不要逃 亲爱的
[01:43.03]讨厌爱情 失去爱情会让你失去一切
[01:45.63]这些日子一直迷迷糊糊 最好清醒过来
[01:48.39]我时时刻刻都记着你的脸庞
[01:51.27]谁都不能让你找回自己 但是
[01:52.77]我可以吗
[01:54.08]你不知道该做什么
[01:55.58]你只是在寻找一个能让你放下过去的人 告诉我
[01:58.42]我可以吗
[02:05.00]我会让这个世界充满温暖
[02:07.87]想念我们第一次独处的时候
[02:16.23]完全失去了控制
[02:19.05]你说差一点就无法挽回
[02:27.21]等待是最好的选择
[02:29.92]永恒的时间 是我的一切
[02:38.43]拼凑起来 又支离破碎
[02:40.73]需要付出源源不断的精力
[02:49.23]我爱你吗
[03:00.56]我会知足吗
[03:11.15]我绝对不会倒下
[03:13.98]我试图给你描绘更加美好的生活
[03:15.61]然后一起畅想未来
[03:17.69]是我的错 是我太保守了
[03:20.99]蒙蔽她的双眼 盲目向前 直到碰壁才停下
[03:24.38]我从来都不是走过场而已
[03:25.98]我只想让你慢慢地冷静下来
[03:28.10]我们只能越来越好
[03:30.91]我们只能越来越好
[03:34.38]我爱你吗
[03:45.69]我会知足吗
